title: On lisse non-admissible minimal and principal W-algebras
authors: Tomoyuki Arakawa, Thomas Creutzig, and Kazuya Kawasetsu
abstract:
We discuss a possible generalization of a result by the third-named author on
the rationality of non-admissible minimal W-algebras. We then apply this
generalization to finding rational non-admissible principal W-algebras.
